transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Main bol raha tha inka aap online aa jao to apan dekh lete hain ek baar sari cheeze.
Executive: Sir abhi main kya dukaan pe hoon ghar pe laptop hai main dopahar ko karta hoon.
Executive: Koi time fix kar lo sir fir to badhiya rahega. Main bhi fir us time pe free rahunga aap bhi free rahna.
Customer: Batao aap aap hi bata do main us time chala jaunga.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap bata do sir dekho main to 9:00 se 6:00 meri duty rehti hai.
Customer: 12:00 baje tak.
Executive: Kitne baje?
Customer: 12:00 baje tak kar lo.
Executive: 12:00 baje tak ya 12:00 baje kitne call kitne baje karna hai aap wo batao mujhe.
Customer: Haan 12:00 baje kar lena. Nahi to main khud kar lunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to come online and check things.

- Customer is at shop, laptop is at home.



Resolution:

- Executive and customer decided to connect at 12:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- online, laptop, time
